name: Transport Cargo Heli Mission
description:
Transport Cargo Heli Mission will take you on an adventure rides. Be an expert 911-air ambulance and cargo helicopter transporter, pilot and transport all sorts of cargos from the port and city to the desired locations.
features:
- Modern war theme & realistic physics with smooth control
- Real 3D environments, with multiple camera views
-Amazing vehicle simulation features
- Realistic military flying & Parking Simulator Games Experience
